395:4: tadā te devā nāgā yakṣā rākṣasā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ |
395:6: atha teṣāṃ bodhisattvenāṃ madhye gaganagañjo nāma bodhisattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat–kuto bhagavan raśmaya āgacchanti ?
395:7: bhagavānāha–eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavane viharati,
395:11: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat–kenopāyena paśyeyamahamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam?
395:13: yadā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkrāntaḥ,
395:14: tadā jetavane mahāvihāre divyāni puṣpavarṣāṇi patanti,
395:19: lohitadaṇḍāni suvarṇarūpyapatrāṇi anekāni puṣpavṛkṣaśatāni anekāni puṣkariṇīśatāni puṣpaparipūrṇāni paramaśobhanīyāni prādurbhūtāni ||
395:20: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat–nāgacchati bhagavannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ?
395:21: bhagavānāha–eṣa kulaputra tato balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkamya paramabhīṣaṇīyaṃ tamondhakāraṃ nāma pṛthivīpradeśaṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ bhūmiṃ amanuṣyāvacaramapṛthivīpradeśaṃ tatra gacchati |
395:23: tatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe varado nāma cintāmaṇiratnarājo'sti |
395:30: dhāvitvā pādayoḥ praṇipatya saṃbhāṣayanti–mā tvaṃ bhagavan śrāntaklānto yastvaṃ cirakālena dṛṣṭaḥ,
395:35: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasā divyasuvarṇaratnamayaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prasamayanti tasyāvalokiteśvarasyārthe vicitraiḥ puṣpamayaiḥ saṃchāditam,
395:37: sa tairyakṣarākṣasairnītvā tatra divyasuvarṇaratnamaye siṃhāsane viśrāmitaḥ |
395:38: tataḥ avalokiteśvarasteṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ dharma deśayati–śṛṇvattu bhavantaḥ |
395:39: āryakāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ ye śroṣyanti,
395:43: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum,
395:44: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
395:45: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā mahāsamudrasyaikamudakabinduṃ gaṇayitum,
395:46: na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
395:47: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhādvādaśakalpānekasthāne dhārayeyuḥ,
395:49: te'pi tathāgatāḥ sarve sahitā bhūtvā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayituṃ na śaknuvanti sma,
395:51: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāścaturmahādvīpeṣvekaikadvīpapramāṇaṃ gṛhaṃ vihāraṃ vā kārayeddivyasuvarṇaratnamayam,
395:52: tatra gṛhe vihāre vā stūpasahasraṃ kuryāt,
395:55: tato bahutaraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandham |
395:56: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañca mahānadyo sahasranadīparivārā mahāsamudramupasaṃkrāmanti,
395:57: evameva kulaputrā asya kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ puṇyaughapravāhamupapravahati ||
395:58: atha te yakṣarākṣasā avalokiteśvarametadavocan–ye sattvāḥ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
395:60: sa āha–aprameyaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputrāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prabhavati |
395:65: te sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ janayanti |
395:70: tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismarā bhavanti |
395:75: na kadācit yakṣatvaṃ na rākṣasatvaṃ na pretatvaṃ na piśācatvaṃ na pūtanātvaṃ na kaṭapūtanātvaṃ na manuṣyadāridryaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti |
395:76: gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sevāpuṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
395:77: ye'pi kecit kulaputrāḥ sattvā asmāt kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājādekākṣaramapi nāmadheyamapi catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ likhāpayiṣyanti,
395:78: teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gamiṣyanti |
395:83: teṣāṃ na kaścit kāye vyādhiḥ prabhaviṣyati |
395:84: na cakṣurogaṃ na śrotrarogaṃ na ghrāṇarogaṃ na jihvārogaṃ na kāyarogam |
395:87: na mleccheṣu na pāpakuleṣu norabhrikeṣu na kaukkuṭikeṣu na jatyeṣu(?)
395:90: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ teṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ tamondhakāravāsināṃ sarveṣāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān |
395:91: te yakṣarākṣasāstāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śubhāṃ śrutvā kecit srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
395:96: ato yenāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ kathayanti–ihaiva bhagavan viharasva,
395:99: vayaṃ ca tavāntike asminneva tamondhakārabhūmau tavārthāya divyāni sauvarṇamayāni caṃkramaṇāni kariṣyāmaḥ |
395:102: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃśca yakṣarākṣasānetadavocat–anekāni ca mayā kulaputrāḥ sattvāni bodhimārge niyojayitavyāni |
395:103: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ |
395:104: te parasparamevamāhuḥ–gamiṣyati ayamasmākamavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nyataraṃ pṛthivīpradeśam,
395:107: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāstamondhakārāyā bhūmyāḥ saṃprasthitaḥ |
395:108: atha te tamondhakāraprativāsino yakṣarākṣasāstasya bhagavato'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti sma |
395:111: te yakṣarākṣasāḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva ca prakrāntāḥ ||
